means: 预言，预示：预言某事，预言
a VHF/UHF propagation prediction program 甚高频/超高频传播预测程序（代号）
prediction of radiation effects by digital computer technique 数字计算机辐照效应预测法
predicting risk of death in cardiac disease 心脏病死亡危险预报
process estimator for the design of integrated circuit technologies 集成电路技术设计工艺估算程序PreD

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"预言，预示，预告"之意。
means: forecast ： 指对未来事件的预报、推测或设想，侧重最终可能出现的结果。
foretell ： 一般的通俗用语，往往指根据客观因素做出的预告，强调预先要发生的事。
predict ： 较正常的正式用词，通常用于人。指根据事实或自然规律进行推断后作出预告，隐含有科学的准确性。
foresee ： 指提前、预先料到将要发生的事或指对未发生的事情形成一种概念或判断。

sentence.Network_en: The test can accurately predict what a bigger explosion would do.
sentence.Network_cn: 该试验能准确地预测一次更大爆炸的威力。

sentence.Network_en: There's no way to predict the future health of the banking industry.
sentence.Network_cn: 银行业未来是否会兴旺发达根本无法预测。

sentence.Network_en: Many predict 1991 will rival the great vintage of 1965.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多人预测1991年酿制的葡萄酒可以与1965年生产的佳酿相媲美。

八年级下册英语单词_百度百科 ... 37 myself pron. 我自己 39 predict v. 预知,预言,预报 41 prediction n. 预言,预报.
2012自考英语二词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... accomplish 完成（任务等） predict 预言；预示 accompany 伴随，陪同； 2.为……伴奏.

list.abs: SAT官方指南OG阅读真题10套 - 豆丁网 ... anticipate v. 预期 predictable adj. 可预言的... foresee v. 预见.
提倡预测性(predictive)、预防性(preventive)和个体化(Dersonalized)的3P医学理念。 转化医学早已在全球.
除了可预测性（predictability）之外，我觉得可行性（feasibility）对我来说，比较重要啦。ㄟ？
预测（prediction）和预言(prophecy) 是有分别的。在英语中这两个词很容易就被混淆。
八年级下册英语单词_百度百科 ... 39 predict v. 预知,预言,预报 41 prediction n. 预言,预报 43 come true 实现,达到.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin praedict- 'made known beforehand, declared', from the verb praedicere, from prae- 'beforehand' + dicere 'say'

encyclopedia.content: 基本词义 及物动词vt. 预言；预料；预报[+that][+wh-] He predictedthat an earthquake was imminent. 他预言即将发生地震。 He predicteda good harvest. 他预言丰收。 不及物动词vi. 作预言；作预料；作预报 用法 后接动词时常用语被动结构：be predicted to do sth。 eg. 1）The hurricane is predicted to reach the coast tomorrow morning. 2）Unemployment is predicted to increase to 700,000 by the end of the year 3)

entry.def: If you predict an event, you say that it will happen.

example.ex: The latest opinion polls are predicting a very close contest...
example.tran: 最近的民意测验预测竞争将会非常激烈。

example.ex: He predicted that my hair would grow back 'in no time'...
example.tran: 他预言我的头发“一眨眼”就会长回来。

means.word_mean: 1. make a prediction about; tell in advance;

auth_sentence.content: Who can predict where it ends, and when?
auth_sentence.res_content: Who can predict where it ends, and when?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Who can predict where it ends, and when?

stems_affixes.word_buile: pre在……前的,预先+built建造的,build的过去式和过去分词→adj.预制的
pre在……前的,预先+car=care关心+ious……的→要预先关心的→冒险的
pre在……前的,预先+cise切→预先切好的→精确的
pre在……前的,预先+coc=coct煮+ious……的→提前煮熟→早熟的
pre在……前的,预先+school学校→上学前的
pre在……前的,预先+sci知道+ent表形容词→预先知道
pre在……前的,预先+amble跑→跑在前面→前言
pre在……前的,预先+caution小心→预先小心→预防
pre在……前的,预先+ced走+ent人或物等→走在前面的东西→先例
pre在……前的,预先+cept拿→以前拿好的[名言]→格言
pre在……前的,预先+cinct捆→预先捆好的→范围
pre在……前的,预先+cipice头→在前面是尽头→峭壁
pre在……前的,预先+cipit头→ation→落在前头→降落,下降
pre在……前的,预先+destination目的地→预先定好的目的地→命中注定
pre在……前的,预先+disposition性情→性情预定→癖性
pre在……前的,预先+fix固定→固定在前面→前缀
pre在……前的,预先+history历史→n.史前
pre在……前的,预先+occup占有+ation表名词→优先占有[注意力]→全神贯注
pre在……前的,预先+position位置→位置放在前面→前置词
pre在……前的,预先+rog要求+ative表名词→预先要求→[有]特权
pre在……前的,预先+ced走+e→走在前面→[时间上]先于
pre在……前的,预先+clud关闭+e→提前关闭→阻止
pre在……前的,预先+dict说→预先说→预言
pre在……前的,预先+fer带来→先带来→更喜欢
pre在……前的,预先+pay付钱→v.预付

Sentence.sentence: For these reasons I think physical books will have a longer existence as a commercial product than some currently predict.
We arecontributingto a predicted worldwide increase in temperaturesrangingbetween1℃ and 6℃ over the next 100 years.
The movies were widely predicted to drive live theater out of the marketplace, but they didn't, because theater turned out to have qualities movies could not reproduce
Its impact is not easy to predict.
The predicted global population growth means that ways have to be found to produce more food with finite resources.

means.word_mean: 预言; 预测; 预示; 预告; 预报

sentences.en: They predicted great things for the boy.
sentences.cn: 他们预言这孩子有出息。

sentences.en: I predicted their getting into trouble.
I cannot predict when to meet her again.
sentences.cn: 我无法预测什么时候会再见到她。

sentences.en: She predicted that he would marry a doctor.
sentences.cn: 她预言他会同一位医生结婚。

jushi.english: This cynicism makes today's young people hard to predict.
jushi.chinese: 这种愤世嫉俗的人生观使当今的年轻人难以揣摩。

jushi.english: The return of the comet has been predicted.
jushi.chinese: 已预告过那颗彗星将会再次出现。
